title: WildFly 34 Beta is released!
content: I’m pleased to announce that the new WildFly 34.0.0.Beta1 release is available for download at .  As can be seen from the a lot of maintenance and component upgrades have been included in this release but I would also like to call out some of the following highlights:   * [] — move from ORM 6.4.x to 6.6.x   * [] — Hibernate Search 7.1.x to 7.2.x   * [] — FasterXML Jackson from 2.15.x to 2.17.x  Within the WildFly Preview distribution we also have:   * [] — Jakarta Data   * [] — MP REST Client 4.0   * [] — User boms for WildFly Preview  Please try out this release and let us know how you get on.
